data.quote: Believe nothing, no matter where you read it, or who said it, no matter if I have said it, unless it agrees with your own reason and your own common sense.
data.author: Gautama Buddha

data.quote: The whole secret of existence is to have no fear. Never fear what will become of you, depend on no one. Only the moment you reject all help are you freed.
data.author: Gautama Buddha

data.quote: The secret of health for both mind and body is not to mourn for the past, worry about the future, or anticipate troubles, but to live in the present moment wisely and earnestly.
data.author: Gautama Buddha

data.quote: If anything is worth doing, do it with all your heart.
data.author: Gautama Buddha

data.quote: Happiness does not depend on what you have or who you are. It solely relies on what you think.
data.author: Gautama Buddha

data.quote: Train your mind to see something good in everything.
data.author: Gautama Buddha

data.quote: The quieter you become, the more you can hear.
data.author: Gautama Buddha

data.quote: Your purpose in life is to find your purpose and give your whole heart and soul to it
data.author: Gautama Buddha
